name: Lake of Tar - Episode 1
description:
A game about growing up and getting lost along the way.

This is just a small part of a bigger story I created for my graduation. This is my first game I created to learn Unity so please don't expect the game to be well optimized. I'd love to hear your feedback and what you think about the game. If people like it I may continue with further episodes. Thx for playing!
